description: Sometimes called wizards, sorcerers, or magicians, mages study arcane secrets and cast spells. While early in their career mages have only limited power, experienced mages are able to cast a great number of powerful spells. In the Auran Empire, a mage might be a wizard steeped in the lore of the Tower of Knowledge, a sinister sorcerer of Kemesh or the Sunset Kingdoms, or a hedge wizard with strange charms and hodge-podge traditions.

combatCharacteristics.combatProficiencies: Mages have weapon proficiency with clubs, daggers, darts, and staffs. They have no armor proficiency.
combatCharacteristics.combatProgression: Mages advance in attack throws and saving throws by only two points every six levels of experience. They do not gain any bonus to damage as they advance in level.

abilities.name: Arcane Magic
abilities.description: Mages can learn and cast powerful arcane spells based on their level and intelligence.

abilities.name: Starting Equipment
abilities.description: A mage starts with a spellbook and a dagger.

abilities.name: Spell Progression
abilities.description: Mages gain additional spell slots as they increase in level.

startingClassPowers.description: The mage has received arcane instruction as an apprentice to a mage or as a member of an arcane organization.

additionalClassPowers.description: The mage can research spells, scribe magical scrolls, and brew potions.
By acquiring a sanctum worth at least 15,000gp, the mage can attract followers.

startingEquipment: Musty old spellbook with beguile humanoid and auditory illusion
Iron-bound snakeskin spellbook with unliving puppet and faithful companion
